EmailTemplate.description: The email that will be sent to those who are registered to remind them to attend the event. Garrett Zaino, 3/21/2012
EmailTemplate.name: NY - Networking - May 17 2012.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at MBO Partners' Spring 2012 Networking Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring 2012 Networking Reception: Zengo May 17, 2012 We look forward to seeing you tomorrow for a night of networking and fun at local hot spot Zengo in Manhattan, 5:30-8:30pm, at 622 Third Avenue at 40th Street. Meet and mingle with Associates, Clients, and MBO team managers, all while enjoying tasty cocktails, and luscious hors d'oeuvres on us! Consider this a token of our appreciation for being part of our MBO family.
We look forward to seeing you!
Sincerely,
MBO Partners
Suggested dress code is business to business casual. Don't forget to bring your business cards! Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171
Contact Us <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
